section.title: Any difficulties that can be expected during installation and setup of Dialog Nibelung Student Profiles Manager?
section.p: We strongly recommend to read section before starting Dialog Nibelung Student Profiles Manager installation.

section.title: What is default user name and password?
section.p: Default user name: Admin, password: Admin.

section.title: How can I change global Dialog Nibelung Student Profiles Manager settings?
section.p: Log into Dialog Nibelung Student Profiles Manager as an administrator. Select FileSettings from the main menu or use Ctrl + H keyboard shortcut to access the settings window.

section.title: What is administrator's user name?
section.p: The system administrator user name is Admin.
